version_description:
Our proprietary SureScan mode became easier: one touch takes three shots automatically.
Better search with smart suggestions.
iPhone Spotlight Search for all stored scans.
Multitasking on iPad: TurboScan works alongside other apps in a slide-over or split view.
Optimizations and minor fixes and improvements.

You asked and we added:
• Sending options for multiple documents. Merging documents.
• Upload single documents or entire storage to iCloud Drive
• Storage backup to iCloud Drive and restore
• Reduced attachment size for smaller documents like receipts or cards
• Support and FAQ link inside the app
• Simple API for other apps to scan using TurboScan's scanning function (details on our website)
• Many smaller fixes and improvements

Touch ID / passcode lock
Auto-upload to iCloud Drive
More document sizes
Better color processing in documents
Camera zoom is back
Options to reduce PDF size before sending
Document stats (scan Properties screen: Pen button)
“Open JPEG In” for multiple JPEGs
“Copy to” feature
Swipe to switch between scans
New options in TurboScan settings:
• Message PDFs
• “Start with camera” option
• Sortable filename format option
• Spell-check names option
• Camera grid
• TurboScan folder in Photos

Printing issue with iOS 11 is fixed
Minor fixes and improvements

iPhone X screen optimization.
Other fixes and improvements.

Fixed a bug in the Restore feature.
Small fixes and improvements.

Fixed a recent issue with adding pages.
A few small improvements.

Fixed issue of slowing down with iOS 11.3
Improved export menu
Added camera orientation indicator
Fixed printing on iPad
Improved the "Open PDF In" options
Other fixes and improvements

"Open JPEG In" for multiple pages is fixed
FAQ page is fixed
Swipe down to close docs or pages
Swipe left and right to switch between docs
Smaller fixes and improvements

- Issue with scanning documents with 20+ pages is fixed
- Issue with renaming of auto uploaded scans is fixed
- Special processing for computer screen scans removes dark areas
- Smaller fixes and improvements

- Receive PDFs from other apps (select “Open PDF In” in other apps).
- Improved edge detection.
- Scanning quality is improved on newer phones (dark text/resolution issue is fixed).
- Crash when creating large backups is fixed.
- Other fixes and improvements.

• Define default "From" email account in Settings
• Fixed a bug with calling TurboScan from other apps like XpenseTracker
• Other improvements and fixes

Automatic shutter
Add page button in Preview
iOS 13 fixes and other improvements

• Auto and manual shooting improvements
• Option to update date when adding pages
• Other fixes and improvements

• Folders
• "Select All" feature
• Selection in search results
• Other fixes and improvements

• Trash bin (access recently deleted scans in Settings)
• Improved focusing on some pages
• Cleaner cropping of page edges
• Option to alphabetize folders
• Other fixes and improvements
